net.sf.jclal.core

Interface IDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCLAL, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataset, CLUSMultiLabelDataset, LibSVMMultiLabelDataset, MulanDataset, WekaDataset

    public interface IDataset
extends JCLAL
    Interface that represents a dataset.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
